elements.text: You are having lunch with some friends from your past. They haven't seen you in a couple years, so you're afraid they will be shocked to see how your PD has progressed. As you sit down at the table, you immediately feel...

elements.name: Lunch with Old Friends_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
